description: In-person test during week 10 practical class with specimen stations assessing plant/animal form, function, adaptation, and lab techniques. Includes 20 questions on practical content.
Online tutorial and quiz covering scientific theory, evolution, and natural selection. Completed in week 3 with immediate answer feedback.
In-class dissection worksheet requiring biological drawings of rat/toad anatomy, organ/structure identification, and form/function questions. Completed in week 5.
Darwinian plant demon design task requiring theoretical creation of adapted plant based on form, function, and plasticity concepts. Submitted online in week 8.
50 multiple-choice questions testing lecture content on evolutionary biology and physiology during official exam period.
